mapper.select: select b.* from (select rownum rm, a.* from (select p.*, u.user_nickname from moons_point p, moons_user u where ((p.point_donater=#{user_code} and u.user_code=p.point_receiver) or (p.point_receiver=#{user_code} and u.user_code=p.point_donater)) and ( point_date>=#{startterm} and point_date<#{endterm}) order by point_date desc)a)b where rm>#{start} and rm<=#{start}+8
select b.* from (select rownum rm, a.* from (select * from moons_withdraw where user_code=#{user_code} order by withdraw_date desc)a)b where rm>#{start} and rm<=#{start}+8
select b.* from (select rownum rm, a.* from (select * from moons_charge where user_code=#{user_code} order by charge_date desc)a)b where rm>#{start} and rm<=#{start}+8
